General.Name: Everjoy Health Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Everjoy Health Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of ceramic tiles in China. It also offers medical services; and invests in and leases real estate properties. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

0.Name: Yuancheng  Song
